author: billbarker
msg: If it is right to ignore "jar", than it must be right to ignore "file".

This should finish passing off the protocols used internally by Tomcat to the System CL, where they can't cause problems.  It seems that under some conditions, that the App-CL recursively tries to re-load handlers that it cares about.  With this, it goes back to the 3.3.0 behavior for CL-related protocols.

author: billbarker
msg: It seems that some JVMs handle "jar" specially, so decline if the protocol is "jar"
